So I would say, as long as you understand that this a very gently flavored item, of predictably low quality pasta, and that will suit your purposes, great.  I appreciate honest reviews that others leave of their opinions, since it helps me figure out what I might like that I haven't tried yet.  We all have different tastes and needs for products, so I hope this review helps those who were thinking along the lines that I was when ordering this.

I didn't think it possible, but the cheese used in this product smells and tastes worse than the processed semi-kinda-sorta-maybe processed cheese used in some lowbrow burger joints. The product actually has potential, but you may want to overlook this one if you want more of a decent cheddar taste.

I love these.  They taste a lot better than the Kraft Mac and Cheese cups I had been buying.  The noodles have a good texture they ares much cheesier and not just watery cheese sauce like those are.  Great for a quick lunch with tuna!

Got a few of these for quick work lunches. I don't think they are very flavorful, though they are easy. I'd rather have a little flavor. I actually prefer the ramen noodles & the various asian noodle bowels to these.
There was to much powdered cheese in each container.  I tried to remove as much as I could but it still didn't taste good.
summary: Betty Crocker Bowl Appetit 3 cheese rotini

reviewText: I've been searching most of my adult life for a good meal I can buy a dozen of and keep in my desk at work.  Bowl Appetit meals fit my needs perfectly.I have had bad experiences with dehydrated food and powders in the past, and had very low expectations when I picked these up.  I thought the three-cheese rotini might be bearable, and I picked up a few other flavors out of morbid curiosity.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The rotini rivaled that of one of my favorite restaurants, and the other flavors were just as well done.  The technology has come a long way, and they did an excellent job of selecting ingredients that work well with the concept.  If someone had served it to me, I wouldn't believe them when they said it was rehydrated in a microwave.The texture of the pasta in this dish and the rice in others is just right, and the flavors are not muddled or soggy like you get with wet-packed meals.  There is a large enough variety that I can eat them almost every workday without growing tired of it.
These are the best. Doesn't take any time to fix and is healthy for you. Family loves all the different ones.

Tastes nice enough but isn't amazing. I bought these for my husband for the days that I don't get up early enough to pack a lunch for him. He doesn't like them enough that we'll buy them again. Instead I'm buying some other microwavable meals for him to try. These are good for those times when you just want something quick and easy and not too expensive. A little classier than Easy Mac. One of these might not be quite enough to fill you up.

reviewerName: Leah Chang "writing at desert spirit's fire!"
reviewText: Betty Crocker's Pasta Alfredo style Bowl Appetit! is a quickly-prepared, tasty, nicely textured and inexpensive snack, even alone by itself. It's even better with a chunk of cheese melted into it and a salad or a few veggies on the side. The package claims "No Preservatives or Artificial Flavors," so I'll trust that info. However, for most contemporary tastes it may be a tad salty. On the other hand, though I'm not writing a separate review, the Herb Chicken Vegetable Rice does not make it at all, but has a not very pleasing texture and a totally yuck, salty, artificial flavor. You win some and you lose a lot, but I'd definitely advise stocking up on a supply of Pasta Alfredo.

While I am sure this is bad for you, it is one of my favorite comfort foods, mostly because it is easy to make and has a great flavor.I do not care for the other flavors of Bowl Appetit because I do not find them half as flavorful as this one.  This is really high in salt (50 pct of your daily intake) so better go light on salty items on days you eat it.All you need to make it is water, a utensil for stirring, and a microwave.  Can't get much easier than that!
I really was expecting something better from Betty Crocker. When I am hungry, I will eat about anything, but I'm going to keep these around as a last resort.

I keep these in a shelf on my desk for an easy hot lunch at work. Following the package directions always turns out right for me. (add water, heat for four minutes)Actually a decent amount of broccoli, but you could make it healthier by adding even more. I know it's a convenience food, but even so, I find it a bit too salty. I'm always thirsty after eating it. But, it's yummy and my other coworkers always ask what I've made because it smells good, too.
i love the food as it is worth 5 star and the product arrived early as i didnt expect so i recommend this to any one
You'll love it, and you can taste the vitamins.  Make sure it cooks a little and follow directions.
summary: Excellent Source for Instant Broccoli and instant pasta

reviewText: Pasta Alfredo? Hardly. They should have called it "Pasta Not So Alfredo".My only wish is that I could rate it -1 star.It came in a pack of 12. I've got 11 that I don't want.After following directions to the letter, I ate about half, and threw the rest out.It made my stomach feel as if I had swallowed a stone.In the past, I have learned that you shouldn't expect super great taste out ofsuch types of products, however, very few have been THIS horrible. It wasabsolutely disgusting.I hate wasting food, even if it is this bad. I've decided I'm going to donate theother 11 packages to the local food pantry. Maybe someone else will enjoy this?
summary: Don't be fooled - doesn't taste like Alfredo

reviewText: Meh, not that great. Comes out too thick and gloppy.  More of a chemical than cheesy taste. Not really recommended.
The best part of this is the garlic.  Next, it's a tasty, filling little snack, side dish, lunch or whatever you want to make of it.  And certainly quick and easy enough to fix.  I'm impressed.

These taste very good and are quick and easy.  The only disappointment is the fact that there is trans fat in them.  I figured in this day and age that would be pretty much a no go but I guess Betty Crocker hasn't gotten a clue yet.

This is good for the evenings when we are not up to cooking a complicated meal.  We stir fry and add meat and vegetables when the noodles are ready to stand for 2 minutes.  It is all very fast, tasty, and in expensive.  This also means easy clean up.  One bowl for each of us.  We don't eat a lot and we often have enough left over for another meal.
summary: Good to eat and easy to make

reviewText: Cook the noodles according to instructions, toss in some cooked chicken, turkey or fish, some frozen vegetables, and you have a meal.

This pasta fits perfect by itself with any meal.  Or, I enjoy adding small bits of broccoli, asparagas, or even red pepper.  To make a meal out of it you can add even more, including meats without a lot of preparation time and pans.  It's the perfect meal addition or a complete meal too.  Convenient with a tasty sauce.  My favorite.

I really like everything about the product, even though it is a trifle "rich" for my digestion, so I don't eat it as often as the rice dishes. However, like the other "sides" dishes, it is easily and quickly prepared, stores nicely, and am glad it's also on the "subscribe & save" list. Will continue to purchase it.
Great with Grilled Chicken, caramelized onions and crunchy, lightly grilled green peppers.Also good with Italian Sausage or Chorizo.Delish!!

I just has someone turn me on to these and I was so surprised when I saw the price.I just love Alfredo, and this stuff is really good.  However, I suggest you do. It rigs it and cook it a little slow, or it just doesn't taste as good.You can also just mix these with a little chicken and vegetables and have a meal.  You can so all sorts of things with this.Really happy with this product.

This is my favorite flavor of the Knorr pasta sides. Very quick to make. Goes great with chicken. I love adding pieces of cooked chicken and broccoli to this. Nice for summer since you can make it quickly without heating the house up.
love this and it whips up in a jiff. Great to mix with meat and veggies for a main dish or as a side dish. We are going through the pack of 12 quickly

I've had good luck with Lipton - aka Knorr - side dishes.Most are a bit bland but none have had any "off" tastes. That is quite an accomplishment for any prepared food. I have tried EVERY Lipton/Knorr side dish. None are bad nor are any stunning!This is one of my favorites. Add a healthy dose of cracked pepper after cooking and it really is tasty.It cooks fast, is very simple to prepare and you have a good sized SIDE dish for TWO - or a MEAL FOR ONE - or a small helping for FOUR.My three star rating may be a bit generous for a processed food. Still - I'd recommend this Lipton dish along with their Teriyaki Rice and their Stroganoff. These three are my favorites.
summary: A Quality Side Dish - certainly not gourmet but better than average

reviewText: This is one of my "go to" convenience foods, for those days when I'm under the weather, or just too busy to want to spend much time figuring out what to make for dinner (I'm single, so ... ).Anyway, I use a package of this, a 9-oz can of chicken white meat chunks, and about 2/3 C of frozen peas to make a filling, FAST, tasty meal that isn't *too* out of line.  Once it's cooked, I put half of it aside for another meal, and eat the other half.  Add a quick fresh salad, and I've got a really decent meal, plus another meal for the next day.  Economical, fast, convenient.I've tried some of the other "Pasta Sides" varieties, but the Alfredo is the best as far as I'm concerned.  Price here is decent, too, but keep an eye on it: it can vary wildly sometimes.

I received my order by the date promised.  Really like the seperate boxes.  Makes it so much easier to stack in my pantry & still have easy access to them.  These have Great flavor & so easy & fast to cook.

this one I like the best, have tried just about all of the knorr/lipton rice sides, this of is VERY easy as all are just add 1/2 cup of ilk with 1 and a half cup of water every thing is in the packet, I love that, add any kind of meat, or shrimp, cooks on stove top or micro. fantastic////////

This is a good thing to keep stocked in your kitchen. I dont use many pre made things but this one has a permanet spot on my grocery list? Why? Easy meal when in a hurry in one skillet. Just add some leftover chopped chicken or ground beef.. maybe some broccoli .. let it all steam you into a decent meal when your tired or busy.

This is a longtime favorite of mine because when cooked as directed, this can be on the table in about 22 minutes or less. What I like to do with this package to make a balanced meal (casserole) out of it is this:1) So I cook according to instructions, but instead of the margarine I add 1 tablespoon of Olive oil.2) On the counter sits 1 to 2 cups of leftover chicken pieces to be added when the basic dish is complete.3) On the counter sits a whole diced sautéed onion that I pour into the mix after I add the chicken.4) On the counter sits a diced tomato that I pour into the mix after I add the chicken and onions.5) For serving appeal, I sprinkle dried parsley on top or sometimes cilantro.Adding the veggies and chicken stretches the servings. For me, I have a ravenous appetite. So I eat one half of this and save the other half for my lunch the next day (in the fridge).Wonderful item and I highly recommend it. If you find it too bland, add salt, pepper and some garlic powder. This will make this dish come alive!
summary: Very creamy and homemade taste! My favorite brand of noodle mix!

reviewText: Needed a low cost way for my son to use and enjoy the cans of ham, tuna, chicken, etc without too much work in the kitchen.
summary: Its just basic but allows options for canned chicken or tuna or ham

reviewText: Nice, quick and easy to make.  Not the best tasting side dish you'll ever eat, but pretty good.

I love all of the Knorr sides. The taste is great and this is easy to fix.  I usually make this for dinner by itself and can only eat half of it.  Therefore, my dogs each get the leftovers and give it a bunch of tail wags as well.

Loads of aroma and flavor BUT you need to add leftover chicken and/or veggies to give it some oomph. This is a great staple to have on hand and turn left-overs into a "dining experience" as good as a restaurant. Alone or as a side the family is like "something's missing". Son suggested I punch it up with mushrooms...so the flavors are well liked you just need something to sink your teeth in.
These noodles are so versatile.  They are so handy to keep in the pantry.  They make a great meal all by their self or as a sidedish.  Quick to prepare and very filling.

I used to buy these wonderful noodles when they werestrictly made by Lipton, with the Knorr name added, theyare still great!  One of the best ways to prepare these isby adding two tablespoons of Land 'O Lakes WhippedButter, garlic and onion salt, black pepper, then fold inone can of Swanson's Premium White Chunk Chicken.Instead of a side dish, you now have a fulfilling entrée!
This is my favorite Knorr flavor. I could eat it every other day and still love it. Great value and taste.
These noodles are excellent! Great side dish and quick to fix! Gotta love them noodles!
These are great for a quick lunch. They cook fast and by adding in some veggies and tuna or meatballs, they make a complete meal.

It's hard to find the "Butter" flavor in the grocery store so I was happy when I found them on Amazon.com.Sometimes, I make a batch and just eat the whole pot as lunch or dinner.  Add some protein to it like tuna, left over roast chicken or maybe even some shrimps or something and it would be a meal.  It could be used as a casserole with left over meats and veggies, baked and topped off with cheese and/or bread crumbs.

reviewerName: Wood B. Hermit "Seeker of the one pure and cl...
reviewText: It wasn't all that many years ago that these side dishes by Knorr - a German food company - were not that easy to find in American supermarkets and you would have to special order these directly from the manufacturer or some such thing.Well both the pasta and the rice side dishes are pretty much ubiquitous on the shelves of American supermarkets nowadays and I certainly am glad that they are.There isn't a flavor in either the pasta or the rice line of side dishes that I really dislike; it's just a matter of liking some of the available varieties more than others.This current butter pasta side is certainly one of the more flavorful choices available; the teriyaki and stroganoff pasta options are also quite delectable - in my opinion.I usually purchase the bulk of my Knorr sides locally since specials offering 10 for $10.00 are frequently available. Only on rare occasions - with certain flavors - is Amazon less expensive, as in the case of these butter noodles at $0.84 each through the Subscribe and Save program.The biggest selling point of these pasta or rice side dishes for me remains their great convenience. If you have the main course for a meal ready to go, it's an extremely simple task to prepare one of these well-seasoned sides with about 2 cups of water in a small pot on the stove top in just 6-8 minutes time.Overall, this qualifies as hermit food of superior quality - highly recommended for solitary and not so solitary souls everywhere.
summary: German quality, tasty and convenient side dishes make a quick meal

reviewText: I love the taste of this product. But for me, I also add a bit of stir fried beef to the noodles and cover with sour cream. The stuff has good shelf life, which is good when you order this quantity of one product. I approve of any food product that makes the hunger in the house go away, in such an easy meal to make. One pot and one wok. Perfect match.

Mmmmmmmm ... Pasta Sides! Now this is what my mother called "stick-to-your-ribs" food. It's filling and delicious!I enjoy all the Sides, but this Stroganoff with "fettuccine in sour cream and mushroom sauce flecked with parsley" is my favorite, with Alfredo/Broccoli running a close second.Served with a fresh garden salad and a cup of green tea ... Ah-hhh a quick, healthy feast ... fit for a Queen ... or even a writer. ;-)The entire meal, including salad prep, takes less than fifteen minutes.  What could be easier? Now dig in, kids, and enjoy ... I wouldn't steer you wrong.Reviewed by: Betty Dravis, 2008author of 1106 Grand Boulevard
made this with browned chicken and added frozen peas and carrots and sour cream at the end.  served with a green salad and we loved it.  very tasty/easy.
By themselves the noodles are pretty good, but add some beef and you have a quick, tasty meal. I like to add a spoonful of sour cream for even more flavor.
summary: Just add some beef and you're good to go

reviewText: I love stroganoff, but don't always havs time to make it the long way. So I get these, a steak to grill & either sour cream or country fresh veggie dip (adds a unique, fantastic flavor). After the steak is cooked & has rested, I cut it up & add to the side dish  & sour cream or veggie dip. Wala! I have a nice, easy dinner.

For a little over $1.00 this pouch can provide me with a whole meal as it tastes that good. I live alone and find it difficult to cook for myself. Knorr/Lipton makes numerous flavors of these "side dishes" that are so easy to prepare. Just pour dry contents of pouch into 2 quart round bowl, add 2 1/4 cups water and 2 tablespoons salad oil, microwave on high 12-13 minutes and that's it!  I enjoy these a couple of times each week and have a nice variety from which to select. Because the contents are dry the product is easy to store and they last a long time.
summary: Great tasting side dish or even as an entree

reviewText: Like I said - these Pasta Sides are the greatest!  If it weren't for them I'd probably be dead by now - because there are days that I'm writing so hard . . I forget to eat. By the time I drag my starving self to the kitchen, the last thing I need is to slave over a hot stove fixing dinner. With Pasta Sides I don't have too! Yeah!Author Lyn Murray
This is easy to make and tastes great. I add some cut up beef and the whole family enjoys. Just add a salad and bread and you have a meal.

Good taste and good price at a buck a pack, but you really need to brown some ground beef and onion to punch it up. I've only had Stroganoff with BEEF and/or mushrooms as a 1-dish meal. I think this is great for the base of a 1-dish meal but I don't care for it by itself. I commend Lipton/Knorr's for this "less sodium" version.
I like these pasta sides and buy a variety of them... I can either eat them stand alone as a meal.. or add meat to it for a complete meal... I also add spices when I want an extra zing...
Add a little sour cream to these just before they are done and you will have something that you swear is home made. Great product.
summary: add some sour cream and these are wonderful

reviewText: i loooove the knorr sides!i like to "play" with them a bit and make them even better.what i do with this flavor is that i saute garlic and some chopped chili peppers(dry coarse ground would be fine too) in some OLIVE oil,and then add the rice mix.then i add to the rice  2 1\4 cup water and half a teaspoon of paprika and then i let it boil.when it does boil i cover it(with a pot cover and a small kitchen towel under the cover) and cook it on the LOWEST heat on my stove top for 10 mins........then open and stir the rice and quickly seal the pot again and cock for another 10 mins(total of 20 mins).shut off the heat of the stove top and let it stand for 10 mins.open the cover and stir the rice and enjoy! :-))i love to add some tabasco sauce on mine when i eat this.i love these soo much! :-)

Sorry, Knorr! I usually am a HUGE fan of your products....Not so here!There is something that just tastes very fake in these noodles -- and it truly tastes like there is something missing, too...VERY strange flavor. Absolutely WILL NOT be purchasing this products again. NO WAY! Some of the other items in this line are fantastic, but this one is a zip in our books.
summary: Wow, I have to wonder if there is something wrong here!

reviewText: As others have stated, these have more noodle in them than rice now. It's not bad if you are making it as a side once in a while. I bought this package to make frozen burritos and the noodle addition changes the texture quite a bit. Now it's not as firm of a mixture and wouldn't go well inside of tortillas.I ended up adding extra beans and shredded chicken, then we just ate it like that. I'll likely do similar things to use up the rest of this box and not order again. I can easily make red beans and rice in my rice cooker. This was a purchase of convenience for not having to do as much work with seasonings and whatnot. But I am disappointed in the texture of the new formula. I kept 3 stars because the flavor is still good and the remaining packages can be used as sides.
summary: these have more noodle in them than rice now

reviewText: Delicious!I expected something good but this is fantastic. Yes, the high salt content has to be mentioned but if you don't go overboard and prepare this as suggested, this is an excellent side dish to serve especially with Chicken Tacos. Yes, you can prepare healthy Chicken Tacos and eat this with them or eat alone if you're not in the mood for too heavy of a meal. I'd suggest side dish to others as well.
summary: This is a wonerful side dish!!! 5 Stars!!!

reviewText: I usually cook rice from scratch. But there are days when time does not permit. The Knorr cajun sides Red Beans Rice & Pasta is one of the few packaged meals I've tried and I like it enough to order in bulk. I use less water than the package calls for, which may be why I find it a bit too salty for me.For a quick side dish, I use the package as directed with additional 1/4 cup of minute rice (with 1/2 cup extra liquid), or cooked rice, or a handful of angel hair pasta broken up into small pieces (with equal amount of extra liquid). I also throw in whatever fresh veggies I have on hand (chopped, microwaved if need to). Adding extra ingredient helps bring down the salty taste.For a quick meal, I chop up some chicken and onion, sautee them, and add them to the package content. Cook as directed.I also do a dozen other twists on these and they always come out all right. One rule of thumb is, when adding something that's already salty such as sausages, add extra minute rice or pasta (and water/broth) to even out the sodium level.
summary: Quick side dish or even a quick meal

reviewText: So quick and easy to make in a hurry. It has plenty of protein and tastes pretty good. It's a step above Mac-n-Cheese as it has a bit of texture and is more al-dente than slimy mac-n-cheese. The dehydrated broccoli softens up nicely and ads a bit of flavor. It's really difficult to keep the dairy in it from curdling during the cooking process though, and it often comes out grainy. If you monitor it, you can probably adjust the heat better and stir to avoid the curdling, but then it wouldn't be as convenient. Anyway, I often eat a bag as a meal when I'm feeling lazy and it's satisfying enough; I couldn't do it two days in a row though.

If you like bland and pointless, you will love this product. It is not that it is bad, but I do not know what I could have been thinking when I ordered it. You can, I guess, spice this up to give it more flavor, or add vegetables and meat to make a different product. But frankly, why bother? You can make your own dish better with fresh rice, spices, beans and meat and vegetables if you want them.

I generally do not like the Knorr brand of instant pastas, beans, rice, etc. But there is something about the seasoning to these beans. For whatever reason, they seem to have gotten this right and I have it accompany a lot of meals.
summary: One of my favorites with just the right seasoning

reviewText: I bought them because they were the same price per bag as they were in the store and i figured i would get them shipped straight to my home so saves me the hassle of going to the store and it is a great item to stock up on

My Favorite Knorr/Lipton Flavor of all the Sides! This flavor with the cheddar and broccoli is so so so good! And love the fact that it tastes so cheesy and also has broccoli in it. This makes a quick meal for one or two. For me, I eat it as a regular meal and eat the whole package by myself as it is that good!Highly recommend this product!
summary: My Favorite Knorr/Lipton Flavor of all the Sides!

reviewText: I like this stuff, even without much "doctoring" with spices... more garlic and someTony Chachere's Creole Seasoning 17 ozdumped in it. It's great with some kielbasa, shrimp, chicken added too.
By itself this rice doesn't taste that great. There is a jambalaya recipe on the back (essentially just add kielbasa) that tastes great, but I don't like it on its own.
summary: By itself this rice doesn't taste that great. There is a jambalaya recipe on the back ...

reviewText: This is quick, easy and above all tasty. I use it as a side and also add cooked meat to make a main dish.
The entire family loves this product.  It is my go-to side item.  It is easy to fix and is priced cheaper than my local grocery store when using the Subscribe and Save program.

I live alone and find it's difficult to cook just for myself economically. For just over $1.00 this makes a quick, tasty satisfying meal for me. In a 2 quart microwave safe bowl, pour the dry contents along with 2 1/4 cups of water and 2 tablespoons of salad oil. Place bowl in microwave 12 minutes and that's it! Really nice Cajun type spicey flavor. Of course, it's also good as a side dish for 2 big appetites. Knorr/Lipton makes numerous flavors and they are all as easy to make as this one is. Plus, being a dry product in a foil-lined pouch they are easy to store and keep very well.
summary: For just over $1.00 this makes a quick, tasty satisfying meal for me

reviewText: This is the perfect size for a single meal or a side dish. There is just enough seasoning to have a great flavor without being overpowering or too spicy. Will definitely buy more!
my family just loves these and they are quick prep work in the kitchen when the kids are starving to death!

My kids love this stuff, it's easy to fix and I can get it shipped to my house cheaper than the local store. The flavor is good for a powder. Despite what my kids want me to believe the amount of broccoli you get does not count as a serving of vegetables. : )

This is the greatest stuff! My writing keeps me pretty busy, sometimes I forget to eat at all, and don't realize I haven't eaten until I nearly pass out in front of the keyboard. Barely breathing, the last thing I need is to slave away in the kitchen preparing a meal. With Pasta Sides - I don't have too! Just pop them in the water, add a can of Chicken or Tuna and I'm in business, and back to the keyboard in no time.

The Knorr/Lipton Cajun Sides Red Beans and Rice is a yummy dish I could eat it a few times a week... BUT I can eatRice a Roni Red Beans & Rice, 5-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 12)EVERYDAY Y'ALL!!!  Knorr's/Lipton version is milder in flavor cooks faster and can handle an array of customizations like kielbasa, green peppers or sauteed ground beef/turkey and onions while the Rice a Roni version is closest to the homemade flavors in my in-laws recipe and the add-ins need to settle into the original powerful flavors rather than try to enhance them UNLESS it's Tabasco Sauce (Cajun Ketchup).
This product is very good and extremely easy to prepare. The taste is very authentic.  I will continue to reorder this.

I like these side dishes and have purchased several flavors.This one is perfectly seasoned~ at least for me.Some times I will add meat to it to make a complete meal in one.Other times I will add more spices to it depending on what I am in a mood for.

I absolutely do not get why anyone would make red beans and rice from this package instead of from scratch. It is just as easy to make your own. Read the ingredients list on this--what is some of that stuff?The home made version tastes so much better. You just take a cup of long grain rice, add two and a quarter cups of water, a quarter teaspoon of salt, 1 tablespoon of cayenne pepper, stir until combined, bring all this to a boil over medium heat stirring once then turn heat down to low and simmer for 20 minutes.While it is simmering, cut up a polish kielbasa sausage and heat it in a pan with a couple of tablespoons of sizzling hot saved bacon grease or olive oil or peanut oil or whatever you like. When the rice is done simmering, add the sausage and two cans of well rinsed kidney beans. Stir it all and cover the lid over it for a couple minutes to let it rest.
summary: Red beans and rice from scratch is just as easy to make.

reviewText: howdy y'all,this is pretty good. i find it a tad more heavy and starchy than i really care for, but it's enjoyable - especially if one adds some grilled sausage to it.for me, at least, zatarain's red beans and rice is better. this ...Zatarain's New Orleans Style Red Beans & Rice, 8-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 12)it's a bit moister when cooked in the microwave [per the instructions, it's cooked covered instead of uncovered], i like the red beans better than the ones in the lipton mix, it seems to be less heavy & starchy AND the spice is _much_ tastier to me.take care,lee
summary: good, but [for me] there is a better rb&r - zatarain's

reviewText: I've been eating Knorr (Lipton) noodles for about 15 years now. They are simple to make, inexpensive, and tasty. This particular variety is rather lacking in the flavor department. As far as all the Knorr varieties go, this is near the bottom of my list. I will probably not be buying this one again. This flavor, along with the other two new flavors (Bacon Cheddar and Scampi) are rather disappointing. I would have expected more from Knorr. The discontinued Beef Lo Mein Asian side from Knorr was much, much better than this.
summary: Not bad, but not good either

reviewText: This has so many uses in so many meals like sausage links, used it in stuffed peppers, along side pork chops, and many more dishes you can dream up. Knorr has so many great side dishes that work in so many ways. This one is even great with a bit of sour cream on top of them. Easy to make and great tasting.....highly recommended.

Please note that the picture displayed with this product no longer reflects the current recipe. As other reviewers have noted, the packs now contain vermicelli mixed in with the rice. What an unpleasant surprise when I cooked some last night. The flavor is the same, but the texture is now unpalatable. The vermicelli is slippery and gelatinous, just an awful combination. I wrote to the manufacturer in the hopes that they are getting lots of similar feedback.

I like this rice, it's nice and cheesy. The broccoli pieces in it are really small so don't expect a lot of broccoli. Sometimes I'll throw in some extra cut-up broccoli as it's cooking to stretch it out a little (and because I really like broccoli).

just love these rice sides dishes, they ARE just the best thing use alone or add any kind of meat, add a vegi, if you want, though this one has broccoli in it, prepares in no time, stove top or microwave- just try one,,,,,

I liked the taste of this stuff. But taste is a subjective thing, so what I like you may not. I would get some higher priced versions at your local store and make sure you like the taste. Broccoli has a way of exciting or terrorizing ones taste buds. But at this price, if you like the taste it can not be beat as a source of sustenance. Which after all is the point to eating.
summary: Tastes good to me and good price

reviewText: ...side dishes. The flavor is good and the rice -- if cooked correctly -- has the proper texture. I would like the broccoli to be more plentiful. Right now, it looks as if the company takes one broccoli flower per package and finely chops it to make it appear as if there is a lot in there, but there's not. I generally have to supplement it with more broccoli.
great deal. great product. I sent them out to my son so he had something quick and easy to make

When you're cheap, you're cheap. I had a case of these sent to my work for lunch-time eating. Typically, Amazon ships boxed-purchases inside of a 2nd cardboard box or poly bag. Unfortunately, these cases ships in their retail packaging- meaning everyone and their brother knows exactly what you bought because the brand/contents/quantity are emblazoned on the side of the box. Not cool, way to blow my cover!

A last resort staple, just good to have around, easy for even a kid to prepare...  It has some broccoli to it, but is a high percentage of the "pasta" product, as opposed to what the name implies, "Rice."  There is some rice, just sayin...  It's a packaged food, and I won't be buying it again, most likely, just get the basic ingredients and hope for the best...  but kids love it...
great quick meal.  heat one up and enjoy.  recipes on the back change it up.  add chicken or tuna in the can while cooking for a full meal option.  Similar to hamburger helper.

Considering this is not homemade, it is quite delicious. I was more than pleased. The flavor of the cheese was extremely tasty and there is enough broccoli for the taste buds to recognize. Follow the directions on the package, and all the ingredients cook evenly. I shall be purchasing this product again.
They not only have great flavor as a side dish but they make an excellent casserole when I add meat to them.

I love all of the Knorr sides.  I dropped the rice side one star because it does not use real rice.  Instead it is like 1/4 inch pieces of spaghetti.  I find this rather misleading.  With that said, the taste is great and the ease of preparation is great.  I usually make this for dinner by itself and can only eat half of it.  Therefore, my dogs each get the leftovers and give it a bunch of tail wags as well.

Hi, I like to have meals lurking in the kitchen just in-case I can't go to the store.  These are cheep and are great to add with some meat or even just a little butter or oil will make them taste batter.  But I would not want to live on them or even have a steady diet of them.
summary: How to live poor, but eat well..

reviewText: GREAT PRICE AND WITH A BIT OF COOKED HAM CUT INTO SMALL CHUNKS IT IS A TOTAL MEAL.CAN EVEN USE SPAM OR HAVE THE DELI CUT ONE SLICE ABOUT HALF INCH THICK AND CUT IT UP.TASTES GREAT, AND GOOD PRICE FOR A WHOLE MEAL, I ENJOY, AND EASY TO COOK UP AND QUICK.
I bought this for my son.  He loves this kind of food!  He eats this with anything such as fried chicken and steamed shrimps.

I've eaten these rice sides for probably 10 years or more now, and this Cheddar Broccoli variety used to be my favorite.  Unfortunately, a while back, Knorr bought out the Lipton line of rice products and subsequently proceeded to cut costs in any way possible to make more money.  This has unfortunately resulted in the previously quite cheesy rice dish being reduced to a shadow of its former self.  I bought a box of these because I hadn't had them in a while, and because the Chicken and Broccoli variety still holds up well enough only to discover that the new mix results in a very wet cheese sauce (after cooking in the microwave according to the package directions) that is considerably less cheesy than one would expect.  Eventually enough of the sauce will evaporate/soak into the rice & pasta mixture to increase the flavor a bit, but I can't recommend it anymore.  It's become thoroughly average in every respect.
summary: A Formerly Great Product Made Worse by Coporate Cuts

reviewText: I LOVE rice dishes including many of this brands (Knorr) offerings.I love the taco rice and the teriyaki rice dishes are my favorites.I like Brocolli cheese soup and I thought "THIS IS GOING TO BE GREAT!"BOY WAS I WRONG. this was extremely bland. Not much flavor at all. This lookedAnd tasted like plain rice and vermicelli with tiny little bits of broccoli in it.There was no taste of cheese nor the color of cheddar of cheese about it.If you like broccoli cheddar keep looking because THIS ISN'T IT!

My next door neighbor told me about this product. I had never heard of it! Knorr Rice Side is so much easier and quicker to prepare than Rice A Roni. I use the stove method. The great thing about Knorr Rice Sides is that you can add anything to it! While it is cooking for 7 minutes, you can heat in the microwave left over meat/vegetables to add to it. I steam a small bag of vegetables in the microwave and with a can of tuna or a microwavable Smoked Sausage I have a meal for one (if you are real hungry) or two! Twelve minutes before Jeopardy comes upon my TV screen, I can make a variation of this meal and be seated to watch the show with meal and beverage just before the program begins!  Eaten by itself without added food, for the college student of anyone eating ramen for budget purposes, this would be much more filling or could make the "budget menu" more appealing! My only complain to Amazon is that they have raised the 12 pack price way above $12 on many flavors! Local stores sell all the flavors for 79 cents to a dollar per packet. Amazon leaves the people who need it the most out of the buyers market. They do offer one or two at the 12 pack $12 dollar price! The Cajun Bean is almost  always  $10 and change for 12 packs! It is fantastic as it has a spicy flavor! To close let me say that the expiration date  is always way ahead of when you would probably eat these 12 packs!
Using the Subscribe & Save option, this is cheaper than my local grocery store.  It's easy to make and my family of teenage boys loves it.

230  cal per 1/2c serving.  serves 2.5 but 2 is more realistic. fat 2g, chol. <5, sodium 590 mg, carb 46 gm protein 6gm. Boil with 2c water and cook 7 min. easy to make. no artificial flavors or colors per pkg. i added cook cubed chicken and additional veggies to change things up. a brand i will always trust. does well in magic bullet with milk to thin or chicken/veggie broth
summary: knorr lipton rice & sauce chicken broccoli

reviewText: I love all of the Knorr sides.  I dropped the rice side one star because it does not use real rice.  Instead it is like 1/4 inch pieces of spaghetti.  I find this rather misleading.  With that said, the taste is great and the ease of preparation is great.  I usually make this for dinner by itself and can only eat half of it.  Therefore, my dogs each get the leftovers and gve it a bunch of tail wags as well.
One of the go-to staples in my cupboard. I add cooked chicken sometimes for a great casserole. It always makes a big hit at pot luck lunches.
summary: I keep it in my kitchen cabinet all the time

reviewText: I've eaten these on and off for a long time, probably more than 10 years at this point, and although Knorr has undoubtedly been a detriment to the product in its efforts to cut down on costs, the chicken and broccoli variety holds up quite well to this day.  I keep these around for nights when I don't feel like cooking, and they're very easy to make, particularly if you use the microwave.  A bit of water and butter, 12 minutes in the microwave, and dinner is ready.A few things to note:-This side dish is now half rice, half vermicelli pasta these days.-If you leave it in the microwave for even a few minutes after it's finished cooking, whatever sauce might have been left to moisten the dish WILL dry out quickly, leaving you with an edible, but not ideal meal.-While the dish has enough salt in the seasoning mix to make most people cringe upon looking, it tastes much better if you add some fresh pepper to it after cooking.  It gives a bit of an extra note where there is otherwise a pretty heavy chicken flavor throughout.  The broccoli does not come through all that great, but it does cut the chicken enough to merit buying the one with broccoli over the plain chicken variety.

Lets get this straight-most of Knorr's sides are awesome and an inexpensive way to make a meal, but the flavor for the mushroom rice isnt here- its just too bland, I dont taste the mushroom flavor at all. How I solved this was by addingreal mushrooms or onions or beef stock, but you shouldnt have to add anything to this to make it good, This is a flavor I wont be buying again.
this little package makes into a very very good meal for one or two, just add any  kind of meat even you own vegie, cooks on stove top or microwave in no time...............

I love this stuff. I eat it alone, mixed with some fresh veggies or as a side dish. I love the flavor. Having it by itself, with some fresh veggies mixed in, it's only 650 calories [if you use butter or margarine]. I don't add butter or margarine and it's only 575 calories. That's really not bad for a meal. It has no trans-fats and it microwaves in 10-12 minutes.Although, I prefer when they sell it with a coupon deal or just at a lower cost.My only problem with this product is that it's made/distributed by Unilever and they test their [non-food] products on animals. Normally I would not buy anything made/distributed by Unilever, but I've been eating these for over twenty years, since they were just "Lipton Sides" and haven't broken myself of the habit yet. Eventually, I will.

I'm happy I purchase this rice online. The taste and texture is very good. I use it for dinner,  as a side item, I get three serving a pack.  For my family.  I'm please to have purchase the twelve packs. Also I quick solution for dinner time.

I am a big fan of Knorr broth and sauce mixes and use them frequently not only because of their great flavors, but also their lower sodium content.  So I decided to give the Mushroom Rice Sides and the Asian Chicken Fried Rice Sides a try.  What a huge disappointment!  Not only are they sticky and gummy texture-wise, they are virtually tasteless.  Could not detect any mushroom flavor at all.  Tried both the stove top and microwave directions, and got the same poor results.  Then tried adding broth mix, various herbs, onions, etc., all to no avail.  The remaining nine packages of each of these are packed up for delivery to the local Food Bank.

I tried and loved the Knorr Taco rice.So I tried this earlier today. I am NOT impressed. I love mushrooms. This rice and vermicelli stuck together in large clumps.The flavor was very bland. Deffinately not what I was expecting. Nor did I see any mushroom bits in it.I will probably not get this again.

this is quite good, everything is already in the packet, you just follow the directions on back, you can have it as a side dish or add meat, vegi's come with it, great when you are in a hurry, cooks on stove top or microw.

This is good to have in stock when you need food but really don't want to make a big deal out of making food. I liked the taste of this stuff. But taste is a subjective thing, so what I like you may not. I would get some higher priced versions at your local store and make sure you like the taste. Food has a way of exciting or terrorizing ones taste buds. But at this price, if you like the taste it can not be beat as a source of sustenance. Which after all is the point to eating.
summary: I like the taste of this stuff

reviewText: OMG, I can't believe the variety of these "Sides" that Lipton has to offer. After devouring the tasty Stroganoff Side, I just had to try another "stick-to-your-ribs" meal, so I went for this Rice Medley.At the risk of sounding like a glutton, I'm going to confess I made those little, impolite moaning sounds while eating this dish ... but who wouldn't? The flavor of this yummy rice dish is enhanced by vermicelli, dried peas, carrots, and onions in chicken-flavored sauce.  Mmmmmm ... Oops, there I go again! (Well, at least I'm not burping. ... lol)Oh-hhh, I see other tempting varieties: Asian Sides, Fiesta Sides and more, and all just as easy to prepare as the Stroganoff (see previous review).Excuse me, I'm off to the kitchen again. These are so easy, so delicious, I may never "cook" again.Reviewed by: Betty Dravis, 2008author of: Millennium Babe: The Prophecy
I could eat this stuff every day. It tastes great on its own, with other things mixed in or as a side dish.
summary: It tastes great on its own

reviewText: Love rice - and now it's twice as nice with this medley. It's delicious and savory - better than I could do on my own. You saved me! :)Author Lyn Murray

I really love these ostrim sticks - they taste like pleasant beef jerky and are in handy stick packages, and have a nice spicy flavor with a bite to it. They are nice and lean, which i like over actual beef jerky.Word to the wise, however; do not open these before you plan to eat them (or eat only half and try to save the rest for later). I guess once they touch the air, they start to change taste and eventually will mold, which I found out the hard way.
The taste is amazing and far better than any beef jerky, or other meat snacks I've had in the past. I also love the nutritional profile. Price isn't bad either so I will definitely keep buying.
summary: Better than any other meat snacks I've had

reviewText: I bought the Ostrim with a little apprehension never having eaten any Ostrich meat.  After I had my first bite I KNEW I would be ordering more!  This is one of the best beef sticks (ok beef and Ostrich) that I have tasted, not only that it is very low calorie and high protein (which helps you feel full longer) and is all natural.  I'm not even half down with my first order and I already ordered a second batch.  This is just really good stuff, if you like beef jerky and beef sticks try this and you'll probably like it.  When you eat it the stick has a snap to it, tastes clean, not oily / greasy or fatty.  You taste just meat and before you know it you've eaten the whole thing and are thing about another.
summary: This stuff is awesome - VERY TASTY!

reviewText: I ordered this because the title and description both say "pack of 20" which I thought was a good deal, but what I received was a pack of 10, which is of course not such a great deal.Please update the product title and description to accurately describe what you're selling.The product itself is excellent, so I will update my review if this misinformation is corrected.
summary: Great product, but this is not a pack of 20

reviewText: saltyness may be the "norm" for products like this, but it doesnt mean i have to like it. its probably healthier than a "slim-jim", but i still wont order again because it contains lots of milligrams of unhealthy salt, and it tastes extremely salty. better have a gallon of water nearby to go with it,if you want to try eating these.i hope they can try making a lower sodium version of this some day..
summary: great taste except its wayy too salty

reviewText: I get these as an alternative to fat jims so my kids get a little healthier snack.  They eat these up quick, but I don't care for the hard, chewy composition.
summary: Kids love em but too hard and chewy for me

reviewText: My husband like very much.  It was a little too salty for me.  But, we both like that there was no soy protein and no msg---both very hard to find in jerky now adays.
summary: My husband liked.  A little too salty for me.

reviewText: I just love these things. I decided to look on Amazon after having tried them at my local Smoothie King. It's much cheaper purchased through Amazon and tastes just as great! It's a great snack with only 80 calories and 1.5 grams of fat. I will definately be buying more. I love the 'Natural' flovared ones. I might try some of the other ones eventually but I really love this one :) Bye bye slim jims.....hellooooooo OS TRIM!!!!

I like to try new things, but I must say, I wasn't so sure about ostrich.  But, I am always looking for a high protein snack that fits into a carbohydrate-counting diabetic meal plan & snacks.  These really taste good !  They don't have any funky 'what the heck?' flavors at all- just a lean smoked meat stick that is low fat, a good source of potassium, and low-carb/high protein.  I can see ordering these again !  Think of these as a healthy Slim Jim type snack.Nutritional info (per stick- and they're hefty- roughly 3/4 inch diameter x 7 inches long)Calories -  80Fat- 1.5 gmsCarbs-  2 gmsProtein- 14 gmsPotassium- 590 mgSodium- 300 mgCholesterol- 25 mg (LOW !!)
summary: I was skeptical, but these are good !

reviewText: This tastes nothing like a slim jim to me so for those that claim it does, either they haven't had one in a long while or their mind is tricking them.  Most of my friends get a whiff of it before they try it and turn it down.  I'm Asian and trust me half of our food doesn't look tasty or smell good, but is often very good.  I love these sticks.  I will admit they are probably going to be an acquired taste for some.  I've only bought the natural from amazon.  I tried some of the other flavors and found them a poor product.  Their additional flavors were in harsh contrast to the natural flavor of the ostrich meat so I can see how some would see it as a turn off.  My personal opinion though.Like a few other said, I don't like the inconsistency.  Sometimes the quality is good, sometimes not. I'm wondering if there are dips in the ostrich meat market where they have to sometimes use meat they normally wouldn't.  Or if they were left in bad conditions too long during transport.  If the saltiness and dryness were consistent each time, I'd be much happier.
summary: Acquired taste and great when delivered fresh

reviewText: I ordered these on May 21 and they turned out old with a bad aftertaste, however I order another batch around mid June and they taste totally fresh and great.I would really appreciate a refund on the order that tasted old and had an aftertaste, or be offered a fresh batch of the product, such would dictate good customer service.Update:I've contacted Amazon on the specific order of this item that tasted old and had an aftertaste, I've been reimbursed for that specific order right away. That's the Amazon customer service I've grown used to, excellent, and will keep me returning as a loyal customer.Thank you Amazon.

It's healthier than most meat snacks, and it is filling. Great for those moments that you are either too busy or too lazy to make a meal. The fact that it's individually wrapped allows you to always carry one with you. I leave some at work for when I get hungry or for when I am so busy that I don't have time for lunch. My favorite flavor is the original, followed by the peppered. This is also a great price per oz.

My wife and I both love all of the OSTRIM products and eat a few per week. They are an excellent snack for when you want a little something to hold you over for  a few hours before eating a proper meal.

I didn't order these snack sticks from Amazon, but decided to give my review anyway. I'm required to get 60 grams of protein per day, so I have to be resourceful. I thought I'd try these sticks based on the many positive reviews. At first I was reluctant to eat them because of them being made from ostrich, but I couldn't taste anything different in them. They are delicious! They remind me of Slim Jim's but a lot better. They're not greasy and they're thicker. They are a bit difficult to chew, so be careful about that. Also, they're very filling. I could only eat half a stick at a time. I highly recommend this low-cal, high protein snack.

As someone who has been a fan of Ostrim products for the past five years, I have probably eaten 300-400 of these high protein snacks without incident.  Unfortunately, this was not the case with my purchase in February of 2011. In an attempt to shave costs off of my high protein diet that can over 1,000 dollars per month for one person, I decided to purchase 60 Ostrim sticks (3 x 20) in regular, barbecue and teriyaki flavors. Since the expiration dates of these are generally a year into the future, I assumed that I could store the sticks for several weeks.  I was dead wrong.After about four weeks of storing the sticks at room temperature, several of the shrink-wrapped air-tight sticks started inflating like balloons. This is a sign CO2 and methane being generated during decomposition. The inflated sticks were discarded and the few remaining that were still in their normal shrink-wrapped state were placed in a refrigerator.About a week later, I ate three refrigerated sticks just before heading to a venue for which I purchased tickets.  This enabled me to get an exact timeline of the events, which are chronicled below.  Suffice it to say, about four hours after eating three of the refrigerated sticks, I became deathly ill.  I am 99% certain the Ostrim sticks were the source of the food poisoning due to the highly controlled, high protein diet at the time where every food, calorie, and gram of protein was being monitored.The symptoms were so severe, I thought about going to the hospital. My girlfriend at the time was a physician who was able to provide some assurance that the issue was not life threatening. It took about three days to recover, which meant three days of zero productivity. In the end, a regular Ostrim consumer became someone who cringes at the very sight of the Ostrim display at my health club.Timeline of Ostrim Food PoisoningEvent..........Date..........TimeOrder from Amazon..........2/11/2011Package Arrived ..........2/16/2011Discard of inflated (decomposed) .......... Ostrich sticks..........~3/12/2011Ate three Ostrich sticks..........3/19/2011..........7:00 PMInitial heart burn..........3/19/2011..........9:15 PMIllness begins..........3/19/2011..........11:00 PMFull blown food poisoning symptoms..........3/20/2011..........1:00 AMFull recovery..........3/22/2011
summary: Major Ostrim Fan gets Major Food Poisoning - Timeline of Events

reviewText: It seems I am always watching my weight and looking for healthy alternatives.  This is an awesome snack, so says me, my wife and my twin grand boys.  Low calories too.  I am afraid to let other people try this, they will want to eat all of mine.  Every time my grand boys come over about the first thing they ask is if I have any Ostrich Snacks.  Nicely flavored and nice texture.  Gives you quick protein whenever you want.
summary: VERY TASTY VERY LOW FAT GRAMS, GREAT SNACK

reviewText: I saw this product reviewed on a website for older women who are trying to watch their weight and need a low calorie, high protein snack.  The reviewer, who was over 40, slim and beautiful, said she loved the stuff so I thought I'd give it a try.  I'm very, very glad I did!  I normally don't like beef jerky, don't like the taste and it's always so hard and chewy that it messes with my dental work.  Well, this jerky isn't chewy like most of them are and it was very tasty as well.  Highly recommend!
I purchased this jerky because it was priced better than others. I ended up loving the taste. I'd definitely recommend these.
summary: Delicious and an amazing price for jerky!

reviewText: This is my first time trying BC mashed potatoes.  They are very good.  It gives you a choice of making them with just water or milk and water. To me they tasted  more like homemade with just water with butter added. Good to have on hand for quick and easy.
summary: Betty Crocker Homestyle Reds 3.3 Ounce Pkgs ( Pack of 8)

reviewText: Really High in salt (3,250 mg/box) and a third of the calories are from FAT.  The package states that it contains less than 0.5% of MSG, etc....again with the neurotoxins!!!  The flavor is not really cheesy as you'd expect from the hype on the box.  The potatoes do remain firm though.  It's hard to describe the flavor.  Creamy yet artificial tasting. No, I really must NOT be sucked into buying these awful scalloped potatoes again.  Buy it at your own risk.
summary: I don't know what I was thinking when I bought this product again!

reviewText: These were too much work and too much time for what I was looking for. I would not order them again.
summary: Too much work. I wanted instant for the micro.

reviewText: One 5 ounce box of the Betty Crocker Cheesy Scalloped Skin-On Potatoes makes a truly delicious potato casserole that will serve four. For me this has become a time machine to a long forgotten comfort food.IngredientsHalf cup margarine (Smart Balance)one cup diced onionsone 8.5 oz can sweet corn or peas2.5 cups water1 cup 1% milkDirectionsin a microwavable sauce pan place Milk, Water and MargarineMicrowave on high for 5 minutesPlace corn (or peas) in strainer and rinse in running waterWhisk cheese packet into the hot water sauce mixAdd onions, corn (or peas) and potato packetMicrowave at 70% power for 5 minutes then stirRepeat the heating and stirring 2 more timeslet cool for 5 minutes
summary: Makes a truly great Microwave casserole

reviewText: I threw away every pack, and I hate to waste money. This product is disgusting, seriously. I am not a huge fan of powdered mashed potatoes anyway, but this yuck in a bag take the cake. EWW!

That about sums up my experience with these mashed sweet potatoes.  Except I wish they made them both with and without the sugar.  I don't always want mine to be sweet -- I like savory in sweet potatoes, too.  And I wish the ratio of sweet potato to regular potato leaned a little more toward the sweet potatoes....Almost a great product.
summary: The potatoes are good -- the instructions are crap!

reviewText: These make a good and quick side dish.  They taste good and are much faster than peeling and cooking potatoes.
summary: Betty Crocker Loaded Mashed Potatoes, 6.1-Ounce (Pack of 6)

reviewText: When I'm in a hurry, I can always count on these potato products from Betty Crocker to make a hit without much of an effort on my part.
summary: Great Product at a Great Price

reviewText: I should have stayed with Idahoan brand. Poor Betty is on her last legs, rolling downhill into oblivion!I've used several brands of potato flakes and found them very good. But not Betty's brand. The finished product tastes stale. Bland, unpleasant, not worth continuing eating---but the worst part is STALE.  I am totally ashamed of Amazon for offrering these packets. My advice to any customer looking for good mashed potato flakes: Move on to Idahoan or another brand and leave poor Betty by the wayside.Where these packets should have been left. Alone. Ignored. Skipped over. By the way, I didn't like them!
summary: One bad packet ruins the product!

reviewText: It's easy to fix and I sometime add hamburger to eat to make a meal.  We like the taste of the cheese

No, these aren't as good as "real" fresh mashed potatoes, but they are about as quick and easy to make as it gets and they do taste pretty good for instant.  I'm no fan of instant mashed potatoes, but these are good enough to do in a pinch.  When I'm making a quick solitary meal, these will be a welcome addition from time to time.

I love the flavor and consistancy--and they are real Potatoes.These packets are perfect for a large appetite or a small family. They taste great with my meals. I usually put half in the fridge overnight and they still taste yummy the next day.I like mashed potatoes with just about anything--but these Betty Crocker reds , real mashed potatoes are the best.

Really easy to mix up, heat up and eat up, Yukon Gold potatoes are known for their own buttery taste.  I also like to use a packet to thicken up either beef/lamb or pork stew or a tasty Boston Clam Chower...so much nicer than plain, pasty flour and gluten free!
summary: Buttery Flavor, So Much Better Than Most Instant Mashed Potatoes

reviewText: great mash potatoes, with extra flavoring to make them just that little bit different from the usual.  not exactly a baked potato but with that baked potato flavor.

I hate instant mashed potatoes, and despite the label saying 100% real I was skeptical when my friend was making these for a group dinner.  Since then I've been using them and found this amazing deal on Amazon.

I am not sure I understand why this product got such harsh reviews. I bought this because I love sweet potatoes but can't keep count of how many times I bought real potatoes only to throw them away because we didn't cook them quick enough to stop them from become soft and starchy. So I keep a few of these boxes in the house as a staple.As a rule I generally lighten up the liquid called for just a little bit and use one of the non margarine alternatives like earth balance or earth smart etc in lieu of butter or margarine. I like these quite a bit with a nicely grilled steak or chicken, etc. Are they as good as real sweet potatoes, no, but they are yummy enough to keep in the house for a quick an easy substitute, when you are hankering for a sweet potato but don't want to jump in your car to go buy fresh.
summary: For dried potatoes this is a more than an acceptable alternative

reviewText: these made cooking thanksgiving dinner so much easier!  i've learned to take cooking easier on the holidays, if there's cooking!
summary: made thanksgiving dinner so much easier!

reviewText: When I'm in a rush, I microwave a mug of water and then add the instant mashed potatoes, and voila! a stopgap meal.  Very good.
summary: I probably like it too much

reviewText: this is a good product, a little on the salty side however it is fast to make and it does not taste like a box

You can't find this particular flavor of these boxed potatoes locally. So Amazon has it! A good price, too. If you like the "sour cream and chives", then this product is just fine. Are there better brands out there? Maybe. But we enjoy the consistency, flavor, and convenience of this boxed variety. Betty Crocker is usually tops for us.
summary: LOVE THE PRODUCT---ONLY PLACE WE COULD FIND IT!

reviewText: The potatoes are so easy to make.  All you add is water.  I was so surprised at how delicious they are.  The size of the 3.3 ounce package is perfect for two, three or four people who love mashed potatoes.  I will never buy another brand.  I'm so pleased with this product.
I was lazy, ordered these. No better then store brand dried mashed potatoes. Will never buy them again, unless I become a full "prepper".

I have never liked powered potatoes, until these.  For one packet in box I add the alotted amount of water, an extra tablespoon of butter, and the alotted amount of milk less 2 ounces. I then put in 2 ounces of half & half and they are delicious. My family really likes them.
summary: Betty Crocker mashed potatoes, Yukon Gold

reviewText: I CAN'T SAY ENOUGH OF HOW GOOD THESE ARE FOR AN INSTANT FOOD.  I WISH MY IGA CARRIED THIS PRODUCT.  PERFECT SIZE PACKAGE FOR 1-2 PEOPLE.  1C WATER AND 1/2C MILK PER PACKAGE.  EASY TO MAKE AND JUST AS EASY TO EAT----EVEN WITHOUT GRAVY.  WILL PURCHASE AGAIN.
Great potatoes.  Unfortunately, they do not have skins or red flecks in them so I did not know that I was eating reds.  However, they were great tasting.
This was quite a disappointment compared to the Idahoan potatoes I bought previously on Amazon. Very thin texture, flat taste, bland, will not get again.

A great side dish and so very convenient!  If your guy is a meat and potatoes guy, here's one way to add a bit of variety to your meal plans.  My meat and potatoes guy really liked these and he really wasn't keen on a lot of "fancy" foods -- steak and baked potato, meat loaf and mashed potatoes ... you get the picture.

I'm one of those odd people who like instant potatoes more than the real thing. These are the best I've ever tasted. It takes only a few minutes to have them ready and most of that time is spent just waiting for the water to boil.
summary: Great taste and easy to prepare

reviewText: These couldn't be easier.  You pour one packet into a bowl, add 2 cups of cold water, and microwave for 3-4 minutes.  They are already flavored, although I did add butter to mine as I didn't initially anticipate that they would be flavorful on their own.They have a bit of a sour bite which implies that there is some sour cream in the seasoning (I didn't bother to check).  It's not overbearing, but my first few bites took me aback a little as I was expecting more of the usual blandness from powdered mashed potatoes.  I also didn't need to add any salt, but I wouldn't say they were too salty; just right.I thought the flavor, texture, and quantity were good and better than many instant mashed potato products I've tried.  Each packet says it makes 4 servings (that would be 1/2 cup each); I would usually eat more than that for a serving; but they are filling, like real potatoes.  I'd guess for most people a packet makes 2-3 servings.
summary: Surprisingly Good Considering You Only Add Water

reviewText: I don't know what to do, one box down, 11 to go and they are awful. Maybe if I jazz it up with something really funky like salt, or cheese maybe? No wonder they were so cheap.
summary: OMG could you be more bland?

reviewText: These are good in a pinch, especially since they don't need milk, which I always seem to be out of (no little ones at home). Although the other Betty Crocker mashed potatoes that do require milk has a better texture and fluff up better, with these you just need to watch the amount of water, or they'll end up too thin. They have a slight butter taste without that fake butter taste. Serve them up plain, with butter, with gravy, or any other way.Now, I'm off to order more...

How great is it to have instant sweet potatoes. Yeah, I know, you can buy them in the store, but not where I live. And not for the price offered here. Came in handy for the holidays or any time you want to switch things up.
Red potatoes just seem to have more flavor and these are delicious and so quick to prepare. Time saver and taste buds are delighted!

To be honest, they tasted like any other instant mashed potatoes; neither really good nor really bad. I tend to make homemade mashed potatoes but I like to keep the instant around for those times when I only have twenty minutes to pull a meal together or I am just too tired to make the effort. I really like the separate pouches. In fact, I like them so much, I still have an open box of another brand of instant mashed potatoes that I have to measure out the portions of but I keep reaching for these instead because it's so quick and easy.Nutritional Information (2/3 cup prepared):Calories: 140Calories from Fat: 60Total Fat: 6gSaturated Fat: 4gTrans Fat: 0gCholesterol: 20mgSodium: 450mgPotassium: 320mgTotal Carb: 18gSugars: 2gProtein: 3gVitamin A: 4%Calcium: 4%** May contain wheat and soy ingredients
summary: Typical Instant Mashed Potatoes but GREAT Packaging

reviewText: I bought a box of these on impulse at my local grocery store, and they sat in the pantry until the day came that I needed a side dish that wouldn't take much time to prepare.  My family loved them!  I'm sure they are not as good as the real thing (having never actually mashed sweet potatoes) but for a quick side we found them to be yummy and nicely seasoned.

reviewerName: Jeri Zerr "formerly a Road Warrior of the Nth...
reviewText: I first found the Betty Crocker Sweet Mashed Potatoes when on a disaster deployment and needed something I could "cook" on a moments notice for lunches at the office or dinner back in my travel trailer (imagine living in a travel trailer in the Great Plains as autumn is setting in and the nearest standing "restaurant" is a "diner" 10 miles away and the next real place to get a hot meal is a diner over 30 minutes away... and full of tough looking guys from the railroad..There are 2 pouches each containing about 3 'servings' in each box. Quite frankly, one pouch is perfect for a larger individual meal with maybe a sandwich or a piece of fish or a small steak or even as a quick side to a fast food burger (anything is better than french fries sitting in the warmer for too long...)Note it does NOT take 8 Minutes to prepare - I set the water kettle or coffee pot to make hot water, dump the pouch into a bowl, add a pad of butter (preferably real!), toss in a dash of pepper, pour the now ready hot water into the bowl, fluff with a fork and let sit while I'm pouring my drink and gathering up the main item to set on the table (usually next to the laptop, who has time NOT to work - or surf the 'net - in these situations?!)So in a pinch, such as while on a disaster deployment living in a travel trailer or in a hotel room with just a coffee pot (hot water), these packets are GREAT!!!  Remember, most every hotel has something resembling "butter" in their breakfast area....  But for a large family gathering I highly suggest making "real food".From the Box: Serving Size: 1/3 cup as packaged  Servings per Container about 6 (roughly 3 in each pouch)Calories  120  DVCalories from fat  5Total Fat  1g  1%Saturated Fat  .5g  2%Sodium  310 mg  13%Potassium  260 mg  8% (good source!)Total Carbs  26 g  9%Dietary Fiber  1 g  5%Sugars  10 gProtein  2 gVitamin A  8%Calcium  0%Iron  2%Quite frankly the ingredient list is rather concerning, but what else can be expected from boxed convenience foods?POTATOES, SWEET POTATOES, SUGAR, BROWN SUGAR, SALT, MALTODEXTRIN, MARGARINE, NATURAL FLAVOR, WHEY, PARTIONALLY HYDRATED SOYBEAN OIL, SPICE, SODIUM CASEINATE, CORN STARCH, COLORED WITH YELLOW 6 LAKE YELLOW 5 LAKE ARTIFICIAL COLOR, ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, TRICALCIUM PHOSPHATE, WHEAT FLOUR, SOY FLOUR, SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BISULFITE, AND CITRIC ACID. Contains Milk, Wheat, and Soy ingredients.Exchanges: 2 starch 1 fatCarbohydrate choices: 2In my opinion, seriously, if you are counting the exchanges and carbs, you are probably better off eating "real" foods. A real sweet potato can be heated in a microwave with a cup of water (helps to steam) in 5 - 10 minutes depending on the size of the microwave and the size of the potato, then add the same butter (less) to the top and sprinkle with salt and pepper.  The only real convenience is the box can be stored for an emergency where the potato (sweet or otherwise) will go bad in a fair amount of time. So I rate this package 1 star for nutrition, 5 stars for convenience, so it averages out to 3 stars overall. I would buy again along with tuna pouches for the disaster preparedness kit or that disaster deployment.
summary: Good to have on hand for an emergency (ie disaster) or for disaster response, would not eat for everyday - too little nutrition

reviewText: No leftovers going to waste, no measuring and no trouble.  Just add the water/milk and microwave.  One pouch means one meal and there's nothing to reseal.  This is probably the best plain instant potatoes brand I've tried.  They really taste "real" and they taste great!  We stock these in the pantry for everyday eating, camping, and for those emergencies like power outages, blizzards, and zombie attacks etc.
I'm not a big fan on package potatoes but my kids love them so I thought I would give them a try I have to say that they are pretty good will be buying more shipping was fast.

These are excellent.  Since they have cheese in them which adds a lot of taste, I've found if you don't have milk that they taste quite good just made with straight water instead of the water/milk mix called for on the side of the box.  Also, since the cheese sauce is rich enough, you can cook up some fresh potatoes and add them to stretch the number of servings and not compromise the flavour of the dish much.  Kind of depends if you are looking for something to cook really fast for supper or if you want more servings and are willing to spend a little more time doing it and save some money per serving. You can do both with this product and get good results either way.You won't be disappointed with these, in any case.  Excellent as a stock up item for the pantry.
I love anything sour cream & chives flavored. This is easy and quick to make. It has just the perfect amount of flavor too. I wish the grocery stores still carried the ranch flavor potatoes.
SAVING IT IN MY STOCK PILE FOR WHE PRICES GO U AND I CN NO LONER AFFORD TO BY THEM.
Perfect size package for my hubby and me. Now that our children are gone this is just enough for us to add as a side dish to any any meal. Great taste, plus we love baby reds!
Great to use when a small portion is needed. Price is right and taste is there! Wonderful choice to purchase.

It is surprising how much more flavor these reds have than ordinary russets.  I'm sold.  One package makes enough for several meals, including potato pancakes the last day (bachelor tip.)  The price is decent, too.

these three cheese potaoes are a family favorite of ours.the cheese sauce is creamy and excellent quality taste. i use my microwave to make these.the potatoes cook up to be tender, my kids love it when i but bacon in these to.

I'll admit, I have those days where I am in dier need of a quick-fix. We all get busy. But I don't want my family sitting around eating TV dinners. We eat at the table, and I want my kids to know what home-cooked meals are like (no matter how inconvenient it may seem for them to take a break from their 'busy' life to sit down and eat as a family). I try to cook homemade meals often. But, to be honest, with two adults in the household working fulltime- actually peeling, boiling, and mashing potatoes seems exhausting! That's why I absolutely LOVE Betty Crocker's mix!Here's why:They're super tasty! Unlike other flakes these ones taste like real mashed potatoes! There are bits of skin sometimes and sometimes thicker clumps. This may not sit well with some people, but I like the natural taste and texture. The kids love it. They're a yummy, wholesome side to any red and white meat meal.They're convenient. So convenient! Mix a bit of boiling water and some milk (sometimes butter) and wah-lah you've got yourself a nice scoop of potatoes for each member of the family. This bag feeds four a fairly decent sized serving. For larger families, I'd opt for cooking two bags.They store well. Unlike real potatoes, that begin to sprout pretty rapidly, these potatoes can last up to a year when stored properly. I love that I can buy them in bulk and spare myself a run to the grocery store. They're a great thing to keep on the shelves for a busy day's dinner.They come individually packaged. So I don't have to worry about opening up a box, and then having it accidentally tip over and spill flakes all over the shelves. I open the bag, use everything inside, and don't have to worry about finding a way to close it and store it away later on.I love these. For the price, I find them to be worth it. I still love truly home cooked mashed potatoes, but these are definitely a great alternative for any busy family (or single person)!
summary: Great Fix for A Quick Dinner

reviewText: This is one of my favorite potates dishes but I always have a tough time finding them in my local supermarkets. So, like usually, I go to Amazon and sure enough, they're available at a much lower price in a shipment of 6 boxes. As I know they'll be gone in no time (my family loves them too) I put them on automatic delivery. No more searching the supermarkets, love it!
My teenage daughter loves these potatoes.  Amazon has a great price on a pack of 12, I believe it was cheaper than our local grocery store and I don't have to go out and get them.

I realize these are instant potatoes, but in my humble opinion they pale in comparison to other instants like Idahoan. They're extremely bland (I even tried adding butter & milk) and the texture is pasty. About the only positives are that they're cheap & quick!
One of my favorites instant mashed potatoes. These potatoes are very easy to prepare, nice flavoring and rich in texture.

Surprisingly really good for a boxed mashed potato.  Of course we prefer the real thing, but this is really good considering it only takes 5 minutes to make.  I do however make it with all milk, no water.  Don't know if that makes a difference.

I have bought these at my regular grocery store for years. I am THRILLED to have them part of the Subscribe & Save program and have them home delivered. There is NOTHING great about 15% off to have them home-delivered!ENJOY!
Take it with you on trips. Lightweight to transport and excellent nutrition.  Make a crumb top tart.
Betty crocker loaded mashed potatoes make a great side dish to have with pork chops or meat loaf or sweet potatoes.  Ms Patricia A. Harris
summary: Betty Crocker Loaded Mashed Potatoes, 6.1-Ounce [Pack of 6]

reviewText: So good, so cheesy, just like this review..LOL, whats  not to like about potatoes and cheese!! We've ordered this in boxes, being that we live in Alaska and stores are an hour away over the river.

I'm glad I bought one box of the Mashed Sweet Potatoes before buying a 12 pack of it from Amazon. My daughter made the mashed sweet potatoes following the box directions. The sweet potatoes looked just like the picture on the box. Looks can be deceiving though: the Betty Crocker Mashed Sweet Potatoes had a funky texture and a bad after taste. I ate my serving and told my daughter she did an excellent job preparing the potatoes as I didn't want to hurt her feelings. In truth, this is a very poor product and not up to Betty Crocker's normally high standards of prepared food mixes.Two star rating based on ease of preparation.Do not recommend.Penmouse
These are very good. They are very close to home made, but when I'm in a hurry, I really appreciate having them at hand.
summary: Easy Sour Cream and Chives Potatoes

reviewText: For a quick carbohydrate side dish it's hard to beat these light weight dehydrated potatoes. They are not the equivalent of fresh mashed, but they come closer than most similar products. For me the seasoning is right, and they have good texture when prepared as instructed. Incidentally, I heat two cups of water in the microwave and pour it into the potatoes in a bowl, whip for a minute or so with a fork, and they're ready.
Absolutely delicious perfect sized for the empty nester's or young couple.  I have never found this type of flavor in an instant potato.

I tried making this product using  two of the methods prescribed on the box, i.e. baking and microwaving. Each time the results were tasteless and horrible.  One more comment: I am no gourmet so a product has to be very bad for me to take the remains, as I shall do here, and dump them where the resident heavily maternal resident opossum can access them.

These are great to keep in the cabinet for a quick, delicious dinner remedy. We have health issues and try to eat sensibly, but there are those times when we're running late, don't have many groceries in the house, or just want some warm, comfort-food and this fits the bill.Edit: 8/13/09 - we like this product so much we now make it as a complete meal rather than just a potato side dish. They are REAL, thinly sliced potatoes with the skin still on and taste real. No phoney flavor or after taste. We now add left over veggies and diced ham to the mix and let 'er rip in the oven. The abundant cheese bubbles and browns on the top and thickens everything up creating a phenomenal casserole/one dish meal. I've also used tuna or chicken in lieu of the ham for a change of pace and that comes out great also. Usually use 2 boxes at a time in a 2-2.5 qt casserole.
